name: frege55lem1a
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2
body: |- wi(wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, wn(w2))), wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)))

stmt.origin: imim2i(w0, wif(w1, w2, wn(w2)), wb(w1, w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wi(w0, wif(w1, w2, wn(w2))), wi(w0, wb(w1, w2)))

body.origin:

comment: Necessary deduction regarding substitution of value in equality. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
